"Throwing":
"Destroying some objects or attacking some enemies can create throwable objects.

You can pick these objects up by Accessing them, then throw them with the Throw action.

Throwable objects disappear when thrown, or will vanish after enough time passes."
"Thrown objects have a variety of effects. You can use them to bring enemies down, or to make rapid progress in Trials."

"If you attack and destroy the glowing yellow Photonic crystals known as Crystal Ice, Crystal Ice Fragments will appear nearby.

Thrown Crystal Ice Fragments explode on impact, damaging nearby enemies."
